member.name: T:System.IO.Hashing.Crc32
member.summary: Provides an implementation of the CRC-32 algorithm, as used in ITU-T V.42 and IEEE 802.3.

remarks.para: This implementation emits the answer in the Little Endian byte order so that the CRC residue relationship (CRC(message concat CRC(message))) is a fixed value) holds. For CRC-32 this stable output is the byte sequence { 0x1C, 0xDF, 0x44, 0x21 }, the Little Endian representation of 0x2144DF1C.

There are multiple, incompatible, definitions of a 32-bit cyclic redundancy check (CRC) algorithm. When interoperating with another system, ensure that you are using the same definition. The definition used by this implementation is not compatible with the cyclic redundancy check described in ITU-T I.363.5.

The buffer that receives the computed hash value.

member.name: T:System.IO.Hashing.Crc64
member.summary: Provides an implementation of the CRC-64 algorithm as described in ECMA-182, Annex B.

remarks.para: This implementation emits the answer in the Big Endian byte order so that the CRC residue relationship (CRC(message concat CRC(message))) is a fixed value) holds. For CRC-64 this stable output is the byte sequence { 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00 }.

There are multiple, incompatible, definitions of a 64-bit cyclic redundancy check (CRC) algorithm. When interoperating with another system, ensure that you are using the same definition. The definition used by this implementation is not compatible with the cyclic redundancy check described in ISO 3309.

member.name: T:System.IO.Hashing.NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm
member.summary: Represents a non-cryptographic hash algorithm.

member.summary: Gets the number of bytes produced from this hash algorithm.
member.value: The number of bytes produced from this hash algorithm.

member.name: M:System.IO.Hashing.NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize the class.
member.param: The number of bytes produced from this hash algorithm.

member.name: M:System.IO.Hashing.NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm.Append(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, appends the contents of to the data already processed for the current hash computation.
member.param: The data to process.

member.name: M:System.IO.Hashing.NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm.Reset
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, resets the hash computation to the initial state.

member.name: M:System.IO.Hashing.NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm.GetCurrentHashCore(System.Span{System.Byte})
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, writes the computed hash value to without modifying accumulated state.
member.param: The buffer that receives the computed hash value.

remarks.para: Implementations of this method must write exactly bytes to . Do not assume that the buffer was zero-initialized.
The class validates the size of the buffer before calling this method, and slices the span down to be exactly in length.

member.summary: Appends the contents of to the data already processed for the current hash computation.
member.param: The data to process.

member.summary: Appends the contents of to the data already processed for the current hash computation.
member.param: The data to process.

member.name: M:System.IO.Hashing.NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm.AppendAsync(System.IO.Stream,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Asychronously reads the contents of and appends them to the data already processed for the current hash computation.
member.param: The data to process.
The token to monitor for cancellation requests. The default value is .
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous append operation.

member.name: M:System.IO.Hashing.NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm.GetCurrentHash
member.summary: Gets the current computed hash value without modifying accumulated state.
member.returns: The hash value for the data already provided.

member.summary: Attempts to write the computed hash value to without modifying accumulated state.
member.param: The buffer that receives the computed hash value.
On success, receives the number of bytes written to .
member.returns: if is long enough to receive the computed hash value; otherwise, .

member.name: M:System.IO.Hashing.NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm.GetCurrentHash(System.Span{System.Byte})
member.summary: Writes the computed hash value to without modifying accumulated state.
member.param: The buffer that receives the computed hash value.
member.returns: The number of bytes written to , which is always .

member.name: M:System.IO.Hashing.NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm.GetHashAndReset
member.summary: Gets the current computed hash value and clears the accumulated state.
member.returns: The hash value for the data already provided.

member.name: M:System.IO.Hashing.NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm.TryGetHashAndReset(System.Span{System.Byte},System.Int32@)
member.summary: Attempts to write the computed hash value to . If successful, clears the accumulated state.
member.param: The buffer that receives the computed hash value.
On success, receives the number of bytes written to .
member.returns: and clears the accumulated state if is long enough to receive the computed hash value; otherwise, .

member.name: M:System.IO.Hashing.NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm.GetHashAndReset(System.Span{System.Byte})
member.summary: Writes the computed hash value to then clears the accumulated state.
member.param: The buffer that receives the computed hash value.
member.returns: The number of bytes written to , which is always .

member.name: M:System.IO.Hashing.NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm.GetHashAndResetCore(System.Span{System.Byte})
member.summary: Writes the computed hash value to then clears the accumulated state.
member.param: The buffer that receives the computed hash value.

remarks.para: Implementations of this method must write exactly bytes to . Do not assume that the buffer was zero-initialized.
The class validates the size of the buffer before calling this method, and slices the span down to be exactly in length.

The default implementation of this method calls followed by . Overrides of this method do not need to call either of those methods, but must ensure that the caller cannot observe a difference in behavior.

member.name: M:System.IO.Hashing.NonCryptographicHashAlgorithm.GetHashCode
member.summary: This method is not supported and should not be called. Call or instead.
member.returns: This method will always throw a .

member.name: P:System.SR.Argument_DestinationTooShort
member.summary: Destination is too short.

member.name: P:System.SR.NotSupported_GetHashCode
member.summary: The GetHashCode method is not supported on this object. Use GetCurrentHash or GetHashAndReset to retrieve the hash code computed by this object.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LibraryImportAttribute
member.summary: Attribute used to indicate a source generator should create a function for marshalling arguments instead of relying on the runtime to generate an equivalent marshalling function at run-time.
member.remarks: This attribute is meaningless if the source generator associated with it is not enabled. The current built-in source generator only supports C# and only supplies an implementation when applied to static, partial, non-generic methods.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LibraryImportAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the .
member.param: Name of the library containing the import.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LibraryImportAttribute.LibraryName
member.summary: Gets the name of the library containing the import.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LibraryImportAttribute.EntryPoint
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the entry point to be called.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LibraryImportAttribute.StringMarshalling
member.summary: Gets or sets how to marshal string arguments to the method.
member.remarks: If this field is set to a value other than , must not be specified.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LibraryImportAttribute.StringMarshallingCustomType
member.summary: Gets or sets the used to control how string arguments to the method are marshalled.
member.remarks: If this field is specified, must not be specified or must be set to .

member.name: P:System.Runtime.InteropServices.LibraryImportAttribute.SetLastError
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the callee sets an error (SetLastError on Windows or errno on other platforms) before returning from the attributed method.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StringMarshalling
member.summary: Specifies how strings should be marshalled for generated p/invokes

member.name: F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StringMarshalling.Custom
member.summary: Indicates the user is suppling a specific marshaller in .

member.name: F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StringMarshalling.Utf8
member.summary: Use the platform-provided UTF-8 marshaller.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.InteropServices.StringMarshalling.Utf16
member.summary: Use the platform-provided UTF-16 marshaller.
